SEARCH
Package antcolony.entities

Class FallingLeaf

java.lang.Object
antcolony.entities.FallingLeaf
public class FallingLeaf extends Object
Represents a leaf that falls from the top of the screen and serves as food.

The leaf has its own physics (simulated in LeafPhysics) and a resource amount (`amount`). As the ants eat the leaf, its visual size decreases until it disappears.

  • Field Details

    • phys

      public LeafPhysics phys
      Physics component that controls the fall and position of the leaf.

    • amount

      public float amount
      Amount of food remaining in the leaf. Starts at 250 and decreases as ants interact with it.

    • col

      public int col
      Color of the leaf (based on the season at the time of creation).

    • PPM

      private static final float PPM
      Pixels Per Meter (PPM) scale.

      Used for physics conversions. 100px = 1 virtual meter.
